TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner
Public MustInherit Class StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner Inherits CompositeActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 為包含結構化配置的複合活動設計工具提供常用的方法和屬性。

span.span: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 是包含子設計工具之所有設計工具的基底類別 (Base Class)，且子設計工具會使用設計介面上繪製的線 (稱為接點) 互相連接。The is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors. 提供的這個類別讓活動設計工具開發人員可以提供多種的活動設計工具配置型別，而不必受限於 類別提供的配置。The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the class.

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 類別以外的設計工具，加入新的分支。The following example demonstrates the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the class. 如果 傳回 true，就會使用 方法來建立新的分支。If returns true, a new branch is created using the method. 建立 物件並做為參數傳到 方法。A object is created as a parameter to the method. 當結束時， 方法會藉由存取 集合中的單一物件，用來確保新加入的分支將顯示在工作流程設計工具上。When this is finished, the method is used to ensure that the newly added branch is displayed in the workflow designer by accessing a single object in the collection. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#28)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#28)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接點是工作流程設計介面上個別設計工具之間的連結。Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface. 這些連結會顯示為設計介面上的線條，而且每個線條結尾都會連接至其所連接之設計工具上的可見點。These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects. 這些點稱為連線點。These points are called connection points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接點是工作流程設計介面上個別設計工具之間的連結。Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface. 這些連結會顯示為設計介面上的線條，而且每個線條結尾都會連接至其所連接之每個設計工具上的可見點。These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects. 這些點稱為連線點。These points are called connection points. 從 類別繼承的設計工具類別可以包含其他的設計工具，而且 會傳回與 `edges` 所含之 相關聯的設計工具所有連線點的唯讀集合。Designer classes that inherit from the class can contain other designers, and returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 裝載多種檢視時，才會傳回集合。The collection is returned only if the hosts multiple views. 使用 屬性來判斷目前設計工具裝載了幾種檢視。Use the property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.
